hero.headline: Book Live Bands & Singers for All Events in Indonesia
hero.subheadline: Trusted platform for booking bands, singers, and professional musicians. Easy booking, guaranteed quality, transparent pricing for all types of events across Indonesia.
hero.whatsappMessage: Hello! I'm interested in booking a band/singer for my event in {location} around {time}. Can you help me with the information?

artists.subtitle: Meet some of our talented musicians already serving clients across Indonesia

services.subtitle: Find the best musicians for every type of event

wedding.description: Hire bands for wedding ceremonies and receptions with romantic song repertoires

corporate.description: Professional live music for corporate events and company gatherings

school.description: High-energy bands for school events, graduations, and campus celebrations

instant.description: Quick booking process via WhatsApp in just seconds

transparent.title: Transparent Pricing
transparent.description: No hidden fees, all prices include VAT

support.title: 24/7 Support
support.description: Customer service team ready to help anytime

footer.description: Trusted live music booking platform for all events in Indonesia
footer.rights: Built with ❤️ for the Indonesian music community.

about.title: About Us
about.subtitle: Connecting Indonesia's finest talents with your special events

mission.title: Our Mission
mission.description: To empower artists and simplify event planning through innovative technology, making connections seamless and opportunities accessible for everyone.

vision.title: Our Vision
vision.description: To become Asia's leading artist booking platform that combines AI technology with premium service for an unmatched booking experience.

story.title: Our Story
story.description: The traditional artist booking process is broken. Miscommunication delays bookings, fragmented payment systems create uncertainty. ArtistLive.id was created to solve these challenges by leveraging AI technology to simplify artist bookings.

innovation.title: Innovation
innovation.description: Cutting-edge AI technology for seamless booking experience

security.title: Security
security.description: Mandatory escrow system & verified IDs for secure transactions

simplicity.title: Simplicity
simplicity.description: Intuitive user experience that's easy to use

for_bookers.title: For Event Organizers
for_bookers.discovery: Artist discovery by name, genre, location, and availability
for_bookers.support: Instant WhatsApp support via AI agent

for_artists.title: For Artists
for_artists.visibility: Platform for professional visibility and listing

why_choose.title: Why Choose Us
why_choose.efficiency: WhatsApp-based booking with instant AI responses
why_choose.security: Safe and protected transactions with escrow
why_choose.simplicity: Reduce administrative time by up to 15 hours per booking
